hero.title: Where amazing customer experiences are built
hero.description: The gaqno platform combines CRM, Omnichannel, AI and your business data in integrated applications to operate and sell with intelligence.

products.title: Platform applications
products.description: Ready-made modules for management, sales, support and automation. Choose what fits your business.

crm.description: Centralize leads, opportunities and customer history. Visual pipelines, activities and integrated sales reports.
usageExamples: Create lead and move through pipeline

testimonials.quote: The visual pipeline helped us close more deals in less time.
testimonials.author: Sales team

erp.description: Inventory, purchasing and operations in one place. Control of inbound and outbound flow, suppliers and operations.

testimonials.quote: Inventory integrated with purchasing reduced stockouts and overstock.
testimonials.author: Operations

ia.description: Chat, text generation and automation with language models. APIs ready to integrate AI into your product.
usageExamples: Send prompt and get streaming response
Generate text or summaries via API

testimonials.quote: We integrated the chat API into our product in a few days.
testimonials.author: Product

rpg.description: Narrative and games with AI: adventures, characters and interactive experiences. Ideal for storytelling and gamification.
usageExamples: Create adventure and play with AI narrator

testimonials.quote: Sessions with the AI narrator are immersive and fun.
testimonials.author: Game masters

finance.description: Financial control with categories, entries and cash flow. Reports and consolidated view of the business.
usageExamples: Record income and expense by category

testimonials.quote: Cash flow view helps us make decisions with confidence.
testimonials.author: Controlling

pdv.description: Point of sale for stores: quick sales, integrated inventory and daily cash operations.
usageExamples: Register sale with items and payment method
Open and close register per shift

testimonials.quote: Faster sales and inventory always up to date.
testimonials.author: Store owner

omnichannel.description: WhatsApp, unified channels, queues and AI-powered support. One inbox for all channels.
usageExamples: Handle WhatsApp conversations from the queue
Assign conversation to team or agent

testimonials.quote: We unified WhatsApp and email in one inbox. Support is much faster.
testimonials.author: Customer support

saas.description: Cost management, tenants and platform plans. View of usage and billing per customer.

social_proof.title: Companies already running on the platform

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: View plans and pricing or get in touch for a custom solution.

cta_banner.title: Explore solutions by product
cta_banner.description: CRM, Omnichannel, Finance, POS and more. Choose what fits your business and get started in days.

cta_final.title: TL;DR: Don't wait for the future. Build it.
cta_final.description: gaqno offers the tools to connect digital experiences across any channel, access to your business data, and AI for efficient work. All in one platform with flexible pay-as-you-go pricing.

hero.title: Serene software for ambitious ideas.
hero.description: Digital experiences with precise aesthetics, lean copy, and secure delivery. From concept to production, without noise.

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Gabriel Aquino
profile.experience: 5+ years delivering products that delight and scale
profile.stack: React, Next.js, Vue, Node, NestJS, OpenAI, GraphQL

about.title: Who I am
about.description: Fullstack developer passionate about creating digital products that combine technical excellence with thoughtful design.

background.title: My journey
background.content: With over 5 years of experience, I transform ideas into functional and elegant digital products. I work with international teams, leading projects from conception to delivery, always prioritizing quality, performance, and user experience.

presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.description: A bit more about my journey and how I work.

items.title: International projects
items.description: Experience working with global teams and clients from multiple countries

items.title: Products in production
items.description: Multiple digital products running in production, serving thousands of users

experience.title: Professional journey
experience.description: Years of experience building digital products in companies of different sizes and sectors.

items.description: Rede ANCORA has over 20 years of experience in the auto parts market and is currently known as one of the only distribution networks for franchisees in Brazil, also being one of the largest distributors in the country, with partnerships among the world's largest auto parts replacement manufacturers.
responsibilities: Porting to micro-frontends structure using Federation
Creation of back-office modules using these implemented technologies

items.description: FFID is a platform that offers message sending services and other tools to help companies communicate with their customers.
responsibilities: Development of fixes and features across all company platforms
Work on portal migration to a new version
Use of modern technologies such as AWS, TailwindCSS, Vue, Nuxt 3, TypeScript and Node

items.description: Startup that develops an application to help brokers close sales and capture leads.
responsibilities: Development of new tools and fixes in CRM and backoffice
Use of technologies such as React, React Native, TypeScript, Node, Angular, NestJS, Docker, DataDog and Google Cloud

items.description: Dashboard for mission management developed in Angular.
responsibilities: Creation of pages consuming backend APIs
Development of interfaces for mission management

expertise.title: Technical precision with brand aesthetics.
expertise.description: Modern stack, data-driven decisions, and intentional motion for a smooth user journey.

capabilities.title: Interfaces
capabilities.description: React, Next.js, and smooth animations for premium experiences.

capabilities.title: Platforms

capabilities.title: API
capabilities.description: Solid APIs with Node, NestJS, and tuned databases.

capabilities.title: Cloud
capabilities.description: Scalable infra on Vercel, AWS, and well-maintained containers.

capabilities.title: AI & Automation
capabilities.description: Flows with OpenAI and pipelines that reduce human steps.

capabilities.title: Delivery
capabilities.description: Clean repos, predictable CI/CD, and impeccable versioning.

capabilities.title: Motion
capabilities.description: Transitions, parallax, and micro-interactions that tell a story.

items.title: Tailored Architecture
items.description: I map domains, define clear boundaries, and choose the right stack to avoid coupling and rework.
items.highlight: Structures that sustain the product for years

items.title: Continuous Delivery
items.description: Predictable CI/CD, feature flags, and active monitoring to launch without noise, even on long journeys.
items.highlight: Launches that preserve the team's calm

items.title: Performance & Real UX
items.description: Core Web Vitals, accessibility, and lean journeys for higher conversions and less support.

items.title: Purposeful Motion
items.description: Fine interactions, parallax, and micro-animations that guide attention and reinforce the brand without distraction.
items.highlight: Movement in service of the narrative

work.title: Purposeful Projects
work.description: Digital experiences that blend clarity, motion, and solid execution.

lenin.description: Own Large Language Model (LLM) trained on lots of books using graphs and Neo4j. Chatbot tuned with personality and natural flow, delivering clear answers without stuttering.

atech.description: Project tracking and team management platform.

newcore.description: Application for brokers with CRM and backoffice developed in React, React Native and NestJS, with monitoring via DataDog and deployment on Google Cloud.

ffid.description: Message sending platform migrated to Vue 3 and Nuxt 3, with AWS infrastructure and modern interface with TailwindCSS.

rede_ancora.description: Legacy systems modernized to React, Design System implemented and micro-frontends architecture with Module Federation for auto parts distribution.

ambev.description: Corporate site with CMS and integrations for live catalog and fast checkouts.
